Sonny Steele.Action: Continues his bull ride beyond the required time just for fun, then vaults off with arms raised to the cheering crowd.
Tosses championship buckle affectionately to a pretty blonde girl in the crowd.
Squirms out of ambulance grasp, limps back toward arena despite injury.
Smiles devastatingly as champagne sprays; frame freezes on this image.
Softly clucks to a boy and elicits a smile from him.
Responds with a tired but polite gesture to a fan's recognition.
Appears blank and lifeless, showing detachment in a dressing room.
Allows others to support and carry him despite his frailty and pain, showing vulnerability without complaint.
No direct interaction or friendly gestures observed; mostly passive and dependent in this excerpt.
Struggles to stand and stay upright due to physical condition, needing to be manhandled by others.

Passes out miniature boxes of cereal to the crowd, engaging with audience.
Appears slumped in seat with hat over eyes, secretly awake and taking two miniatures of tequila.

Pretends to be asleep while actually alert and secretly takes two tequila miniatures from the drink cart.
Wears a ridiculous outfit and promotes cereal in a contrived publicity stunt, seeming somewhat forced and awkward.

Looks past Lucinda, wishing he were somewhere else, indicating disinterest or avoidance.

Seemingly unprepared or uncertain as he asks what he has to do and whether he needs to say something at the press conference.

Confirms he eats the cereal he advertises in a straightforward manner.

Despite obvious fatigue and sweat, maintains a trace of a smile while staring at the cabin.
